Reviews_Description: This is a good car in this segment and it gives a great drive quality. It has great features and a powerful engine which is good for long drives. Mileage is around 12 to 15kmpl. Overall, this is a good car.
It's a good car with classy, comfortable, and very good for a family. It was not expensive and is a very stylish engine also.

The car is really futuristic, everything about this car is premium from the front grill to the connected backlights this Urban Suv has a lot to offer. This Korean SUV can take head-on with any german SUV within the range of 55-60 lakhs. 10/10 go for this.
Best in class with premium interior and styling. It's a new look with a different DRL setup. Best safety features.

Rating_Title: Styling And Aerodynamics Of The Body is Good
Reviews_Description: The detailed styling and aerodynamics of the body are too good. The performance is refined and the engine trim is what I liked the most.
It's a good SUV with all features, nice performance, and a sporty look. This is the best family car.
The car looks cool. Mileage is also good, safety and interior at their best. This is the most exciting car for me.
It looks very aggressive from the outside & also it completely feels like a long touring car. It has also very good features inside it. The only bad thing is its milage.

While I'm looking for a car the most important three thing's are how the car looks, power under the hoods and safety. After all these years especially in India things are getting better and better. The best one in this fantastic year 2022 is the New Hyundai Tucson which is loaded with tons of features and safety. As its a Hyundai it shows its power...
The speechless, incredible, ultimate build quality of Hyundai cars. The interior and exterior were also good. it's a really good experience after comparing with other brands
